additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: account-ref (值: None) - An optional string used to identify separate accounts using the SMS endpoint for billing purposes. To use this feature, please email support@nexmo.com.
callback (值: None) - The webhook endpoint the delivery receipt for this sms is sent to. This parameter overrides the webhook endpoint you set in Dashboard.
client-ref (值: None) - You can optionally include your own reference of up to 40 characters
message-class (值: None) - The Data Coding Scheme value of the message
protocol-id (值: None) - The value of the protocol identifier to use. Ensure that the value is aligned with udh.
status-report-req (值: None) - Whether to receive a Delivery Receipt
ttl (值: None) - By default Nexmo attempt delivery for 72 hours
